```{r}
library(doRNG)
library(pomp)
stopifnot(packageVersion("pomp")>="3")
```

MODELS

```{r}
# Baseline
l0 <- -235.68949546214
d0 <- 4

# Breaks
l1 <- -233.805450489179  
d1 <- 5 

# Intervention
l2 <- -229.448016432163
d2 <- 6
```

TESTS

See section Likelihood ratio tests for nested hypotheses in
https://kingaa.github.io/sbied/pfilter/notes.pdf

```{r}
l20 <- l2 - l0
print(l20)

d20 <- d2 - d0
c <- qchisq(0.95, df=d20)/2
print(c)
```
```{r}
l10 <- l1 - l0
print(l10)

d10 <- d1 - d0
c <- qchisq(0.95, df=d10)/2
print(c)
```
```{r}
l21 <- l2 - l1
print(l21)

d21 <- d2 - d1
c <- qchisq(0.95, df=d21)/2
print(c)
```
